author: Mole
text: I am so thankful for the work that @TheBackroomCol2 does and so grateful I was introduced to them by @DouglieDoWrong . Collection is growing and can't wait for my next one coming. @305miami6924 https://t.co/iBIJAkV07q

author: Mole
text: Just got a knock at the door and @TheBackroomCol2  blessed me with this gift...@DouglieDoWrong https://t.co/RwnEpe489p

author: Mole
text: I can't say enough for the quality and sharpness of each of these pieces by @TheBackroomCol2 So happy that @DouglieDoWrong introduced me to them.  Looking forward to my special piece to get done and signed!  A+ work guys! https://t.co/pkTiZ7dH7m

author: Mole
text: I think it is time to bust out the VHS tapes of the Shula/Marino years.  This team keeps breaking my heart. 💔
